results.title: Drug therapy increases bone density in osteonecrosis of the femoral head in canines.
results.text_hl: The purpose of the current study was to determine the effects of two agents with known bone-altering qualities, @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, on the healing response of a cryosurgically induced @<m>DISEASE_Femur_Head_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005271 @@@necrotic lesion of the femoral head@@@ in canines.

citations.NLM: Bowers JR, Dailiana ZH, McCarthy EF, Urbaniak JR. Drug therapy increases bone density in osteonecrosis of the femoral head in canines. J Surg Orthop Adv. 2004 Winter;13(4):210-6. PMID: 15691182
